title: If any changes are required in the above provision, Government will issue orders in this regard, from time to time
clause_text: If any changes are required in the above provision, Government will issue orders in this regard, from time to time.
section: Notwithstanding the provisions in clause mentioned above, if the developer does not desire to consume the full permissible in-situ F.S.I. on the same site, in such a case :
